title: How do I activate my phone after a factory reset?
content: I am attempting to restart my phone after a factory reset, after I am able to connect to wifi (which happens sometimes), the next screen is my camera. What steps do I need to take to reactivate my phone? I have called customer support and they are unsure what to do as well. My phone is having too many issues recently and I have posted another question about my device, which was not answered. https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/5494884?hl=en
